Sheikh Shakhbout Medical City (SSMC) is a world-class healthcare facility located in Abu Dhabi. Established in 2019, SSMC is one of the largest hospitals in the region, providing top-notch medical services. They offer a wide range of specialties, including neurology, gastroenterology, and colorectal cancer care. SSMC is committed to clinical excellence and delivering a superior patient experience.

Key facts about SSMC

Founded Year : 2019

Location : Abu Dhabi (United Arab Emirates)

Stage : Acquired
